issue.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat
gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat
gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat
gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
Here's a workaround, using a `gazebo-current` 2.1.0 [deb](http://gazebosim.org/tmp/gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb) that I [modified](http://serverfault.com/questions/250224/how-do-i-get-apt-get-to-ignore-some-dependencies/383958#383958) to change the dependency from `libsdformat-dev` to `sdformat`:

~~~
# Clean up
sudo apt-get remove gazebo gazebo-current sdformat libsdformat-dev libsdformat1 ros-groovy-*
# Install the official gazebo-current to get its dependencies installed
sudo apt-get install gazebo-current
# Uninstall the official gazebo-current and libsdformat
sudo apt-get remove gazebo-current libsdformat-dev libsdformat1
# Install sdformat
sudo apt-get install sdformat
# Get and install the gazebo-current with the modified dependency
wget http://gazebosim.org/tmp/gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb
# Proceed with the rest of the installation as usual
sudo apt-get install drcsim
~~~
content.html:
Here's a workaround, using a gazebo-current 2.1.0 deb that I modified to change the dependency from libsdformat-dev to sdformat:

# Clean up
sudo apt-get remove gazebo gazebo-current sdformat libsdformat-dev libsdformat1 ros-groovy-*
# Install the official gazebo-current to get its dependencies installed
sudo apt-get install gazebo-current
# Uninstall the official gazebo-current and libsdformat
sudo apt-get remove gazebo-current libsdformat-dev libsdformat1
# Install sdformat
sudo apt-get install sdformat
# Get and install the gazebo-current with the modified dependency
wget http://gazebosim.org/tmp/gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb
# Proceed with the rest of the installation as usual
sudo apt-get install drcsim

issue.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
Thanks for the note. I'm currently working with @hsu to get this fixed.

The plan is to release a new version of gazebo_ros_pkgs (or just ros-gazebo-plugin) which will be built against current gazebo-current and would bring as dependency the new libsdformat.
content.html:
Thanks for the note. I'm currently working with @hsu to get this fixed.

The plan is to release a new version of gazebo_ros_pkgs (or just ros-gazebo-plugin) which will be built against current gazebo-current and would bring as dependency the new libsdformat.

issue.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
While @hsu release a new version to fix of ros-gazebo-pkgs, I've uploaded a new modified revision (bumped revision number) of ros-$distro-gazebo-plugin which depends on libsformat1, for all amd64 versions:
```
ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1quantal_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2precise_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2quantal_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2raring_amd64.deb
```

They are available at http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/. The way to proceed:
```
sudo apt-get remove gazebo-current sdformat
wget http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/<one_of_the_modified_plugin_package.deb>
sudo apt-get install gazebo-current
sudo dpkg -i <one_of_the_modified_plugin_package.deb>
sudo apt-get install drcsim
```

@noonien_soong could you please confirm that this works for you? I can upload the version to the repository if the new version of ros_gazebo_pkgs is not released meantime.
content.html:
While @hsu release a new version to fix of ros-gazebo-pkgs, I've uploaded a new modified revision (bumped revision number) of ros-$distro-gazebo-plugin which depends on libsformat1, for all amd64 versions:

ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1quantal_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2precise_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2quantal_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2raring_amd64.deb

They are available at http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/. The way to proceed:

sudo apt-get remove gazebo-current sdformat
wget http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/<one_of_the_modified_plugin_package.deb>
sudo apt-get install gazebo-current
sudo dpkg -i <one_of_the_modified_plugin_package.deb>
sudo apt-get install drcsim

@noonien_soong could you please confirm that this works for you? I can upload the version to the repository if the new version of ros_gazebo_pkgs is not released meantime.

issue.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
Thanks very much for the help guys. This installed without error with the addition of ros-groovy-pcl-conversions and ros-groovy-gazebo-msgs. Here's the Dockerfile I used:

```
FROM nsoong/ros

MAINTAINER Noonien Soong "iamdrsoong@gmail.com"

####### drcsim http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Install ##################
RUN sh -c 'echo "deb http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu precise main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros-latest.list'
RUN sh -c 'echo "deb http://packages.osrfoundation.org/drc/ubuntu precise main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/drc-latest.list'
RUN wget http://packages.ros.org/ros.key -O - | apt-key add -
RUN wget http://packages.osrfoundation.org/drc.key -O - | apt-key add -
RUN apt-get update
RUN apt-get remove gazebo-current sdformat
RUN wget http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
RUN apt-get install -y -q ros-groovy-pcl-conversions ros-groovy-gazebo-msgs gazebo-current
RUN dpkg -i ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
RUN apt-get install -y -q drcsim
```
Here's a link to the source ros container: https://index.docker.io/u/nsoong/ros/

Thanks again!
content.html:
Thanks very much for the help guys. This installed without error with the addition of ros-groovy-pcl-conversions and ros-groovy-gazebo-msgs. Here's the Dockerfile I used:

FROM nsoong/ros

MAINTAINER Noonien Soong "iamdrsoong@gmail.com"

####### drcsim http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Install ##################
RUN sh -c 'echo "deb http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu precise main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros-latest.list'
RUN sh -c 'echo "deb http://packages.osrfoundation.org/drc/ubuntu precise main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/drc-latest.list'
RUN wget http://packages.ros.org/ros.key -O - | apt-key add -
RUN wget http://packages.osrfoundation.org/drc.key -O - | apt-key add -
RUN apt-get update
RUN apt-get remove gazebo-current sdformat
RUN wget http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
RUN apt-get install -y -q ros-groovy-pcl-conversions ros-groovy-gazebo-msgs gazebo-current
RUN dpkg -i ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
RUN apt-get install -y -q drcsim

Here's a link to the source ros container: https://index.docker.io/u/nsoong/ros/

Thanks again!

issue.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw: 2.4.1 versions of ros-gazebo-plugins for all supported flavours are in the repo and should fix this problem by using libsformat*. Please reopen if needed.
